item.title: To Die Alone: Never Forget What The Lockdowners Did To Us
item.description: Of all the terrible things the the power-drunk unelected bureaucrats did to us, forcing people to die alone was the most inhumane.

item.title: Anora‘s Complex Marriage Commentary Isn’t Worth Seeing All That Skin
item.description: If Anora has any redeeming value, it’s in its unintended commentary on the sad state of marriage and relationships.

item.title: How A Former Atheist’s Letters To God Changed The Way I Pray
item.description: With a penetrating gaze reaching deep inside his own soul, Hill touches a universal nerve of all humanity: a desperate need for God.

item.title: 7 Trump Orders Congress Should Codify To Keep Wokeness Out Of The Military
item.description: The Trump administration’s bold executive actions will not be permanent unless Congress codifies them in law.

item.title: 3 Ways Trump Plans To Root Out Rampant Obamacare Fraud
item.description: The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services' latest proposed rule focuses on combatting waste and fraud within the Obamacare program.
